function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Historical evidence of urban strategies of containment and spatial distancing to combat disease since ancient times, prefiguring modern social distancing strategies.","Impact":"Risk of disease containment and spatial distancing strategies being insufficient or ineffective, leading to uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce robust containment and spatial distancing strategies, invest in public health infrastructure and education.","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, surveillance technology, spatial modeling and analysis tools.","People":"City populations, public health authorities, policymakers, urban planners, medical professionals.","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, urban planners, city governments."},{"Description":"Strategies involving the rejection or exclusion of people from cities or the imposition of controls upon the movements of entire populations as historical ways of exerting power in response to public health threats.","Impact":"Risk of discriminatory and unethical use of power in response to public health threats, leading to social injustice and marginalized communities.","Mitigation":"Ensure transparent and ethical decision-making processes, promote inclusivity and equity in public health measures.","Technologies":"Ethical AI decision-making tools, public health data analysis and reporting tools.","People":"Marginalized communities, public health authorities, policymakers, ethicists, human rights advocates.","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, ethicists, human rights organizations."}]}
